title: Business Card, summer 1937
medium: Offset lithograph on light green wove paper, mounted on grey- blue wove paper
description: Business card, shaped as a shopping bag, to be used as a tag.

tombstone.epitaph:
Business Card, summer 1937.
summer 1937. Offset lithograph on light green wove paper, mounted on grey- blue wove paper. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-78.
